answers.answer: Congrats I have 14 days to go...I have hypothyroidism and am also measuring small.... 38 weeks but measuring 35...so upset
It's OK and I understand. My first live birth wasan iugr baby. it's very frightening. Elijah did very well being so small. Praying for a quick safe delivery!

question: Woo hoo! I've made it to 39 weeks with this pregnancy! My first I had preeclampsia and had to be induced at 35 weeks. This time I have gestational diabetes but some how I'm not measuring too big and the baby is measuring small. So maybe I do eat somewhat healthy. I can't wait to hold my little boy and I can't wait to are the reactions on my little Elijah's face!
title: 7 days
